LandingPage.description_paragraph_one: Hello! This is a personal website boilerplate with EN/JA i18n support.
LandingPage.description_paragraph_two: Edit this content in messages/en.json and messages/ja.json to customize.
LandingPage.description_paragraph_three: Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and next-intl for internationalization.

NotFoundPage.title: 404 - Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
